category.name: Data Sharing.Multi-Site Collaboration
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_stub_dataset_files_after_ownership_transfer
preference.preference_description: Specifies whether replica files are stubbed at the original owning site when the ownership is transferred to another site. The Multi-Site transfer of ownership feature creates full ImanFile objects at the new owning site and adds full operating system files to the volume. This preference indicates whether the original owning site has the option to stub the replica ImanFile objects and purge the files from the volume. Valid Values: TRUE - Allows the replica files to be stubbed at the original owning site. FALSE - Forces the full object files to remain on the original owning site's volume.
